sentences.en: Hair, face and skin are pretty debonair, so is the sneakers and suit's comfort.
sentences.cn: 头发, 脸和皮肤都很清爽, 衣服和鞋也很舒服.

sentences.en: He strolled about, look very debonair in his elegant new suit.
sentences.cn: 他穿了一身讲究的新衣服逛来逛去，显得颇为惬意。

sentences.en: He strolled about, looking very debonair in his elegant new suit.
sentences.cn: 他穿了一身讲究的新衣服逛来逛去, 显得颇为惬意.

sentences.en: Her father walked down the path, debonair in a three-piece suit, hat, and cane.
sentences.cn: 她的父亲走下小路，温文尔雅，穿着三件套，头戴帽子，手执拐杖。

sentences.en: His debonair charm and magnetic good looks on screen captivated audiences around the globe.
sentences.cn: 他在银幕上温文尔雅以及极具吸引力的形象征服了全世界的观众.

sentences.en: It is friendly, remote, and debonair.
sentences.cn: 卡普里岛远离尘嚣,但景色宜人, 生机盎然.

sentences.en: Life that is gay, brisk, and debonair.
sentences.cn: 快乐 、 活泼 、 惬意的生活.

sentences.en: Quite genuinely , you know, the debonair touch.
sentences.cn: 你知道, 笑得还挺真诚, 挺欢快.

sentences.en: The crowd that throngs the wharf as the steamer draws alongside is gay and debonair.
sentences.cn: 当轮船靠近码头时,蜂拥到岸边的人群兴高采烈而又彬彬有礼.

sentences.en: The head waiter was debonair with the guests but firm with the Waiters.
sentences.cn: 领班对客人温文有礼,但是对待者却很坚定.

words.tran_cn: 高兴的，快活的；温文尔雅的；殷勤的

trans.tran_en: A man who is debonair is confident, charming, and well dressed
